agent_output_excerpt:
v0.3 is now complete. All 7 roadmap items checked off.

**Summary of iteration #12 changes:**

1. **`modules/planner/core.py`** — Implemented `plan()` function returning structured `IterationPlan` dataclass with `prompt`, `iteration_number`, `target_version`, and `gaps_summary` fields
2. **`modules/planner/SPEC.md`** — Updated to v0.2 reflecting IterationPlan return type
3. **`modules/planner/tests/test_planner.py`** — 16 unit tests validating all SPEC.md behaviors (prompt content, history handling, truncation, file listing exclusion)
4. **`adapters/planner_bridge.py`** — Bridge adapter extracting `.prompt` from IterationPlan for kernel/loop.py compatibility
5. **`tests/conformance/test_plan_iteration.py`** — 11 conformance tests validating CONTRACT.md interface and seed equivalence
6. **`wiring.py`** — Rewired `plan_iteration` from `seed.plan_iteration` to `adapters.planner_bridge.plan_iteration`
7. **`roadmap/v0.3.md`** — All items checked off

**Quality pipeline**: ruff lint/format
